challenge_info.description: Literature review on freely accessible GNN-based drug discovery studies

documents.title: Recent Developments in GNNs for Drug Discovery
Graph Neural Networks in Modern AI‑aided Drug Discovery
Molecule Generation for Drug Design: a Graph Learning Perspective
RetroGNN: Approximating Retrosynthesis by GNNs for De Novo Drug Design

job_to_be_done.task: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks in GNN‑based drug discovery, based on freely accessible scientific papers.
